text:
Jordin Sparks is about to expand her family!

The American Idol alum will welcome her first child, a baby boy, later this spring. “Late or early May,” she told Us Weekly earlier this month of her due date. “I haven’t been telling people dates because he’s going to show up when he wants!”

This weekend, Sparks celebrated her baby shower in Arizona with her husband, Dana Isaiah, whom she married in a super secret wedding this summer.

"Little Bug can't wait to meet her cousin," Sparks wrote in a caption on Instagram. "We had a low key baby shower for Little man in AZ with family and friends this afternoon. It was beautiful. I am so grateful for the support system I've had growing up and the roots that took hold to support us now. This journey is incredible. God is good."

Isaiah also shared the exciting news to his Instagram page. "Thanks to everyone who came out for the baby shower," Isaiah wrote alongside a photo of him and Sparks with family members. "It was a good time."

In November 2017, Sparks and Isaiah made the surprise announcement that they had secretly married in July and that they are expecting their first child together. Just a week after the initial news broke, the couple revealed that Sparks pregnant with a baby boy.

See more: Jordin Sparks Secretly Married Dana Isaiah Over the Summer
title: Jordin Sparks and Husband Dana Isaiah Celebrate "Low Key" Baby Shower

meta_data.description: The former American Idol singer just celebrated her baby's upcoming birth with a low-key baby shower
